content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Max. I believe that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement on the rental price. May I ask what your budget is for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price, I want to be a good tenant and pay the lowest price possible. What is your rental price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to be a good tenant, Max. However, as a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains from renting out this apartment. Based on its size and location, I believe that a reasonable rental price would be around €700 per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay €650 per month, but I am not willing to pay more. Is that possible?

I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
I want to negotiate the rental price.
Is this possible?

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Max. I understand your desire to be a good tenant and pay the lowest possible price. However, as a landlord, I need to consider my financial needs and goals in setting the rental price. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe that a rental price of €700 per month is fair and reasonable. Is there any flexibility in your budget to consider paying this amount?
name: Heinrich Heine
